name: DEATHWIN
description:
ARE U TIRED OF ALWAYS WINNING AND SURVIVING?

THAN THIS GAME IS PERFECT FOR U! YES U,  BECAUSE IN THIS GAME THE WAY TO PROCEED OR CONTINUE IS TO DIE.

TRY AND FIND OUT NEW WAYS TO DIE.

IS IT FALLING? OR EVEN DROWNING. ITS ALL UR CHOICE.

THE CONTROLS ARE VERY SIMPLE:

A/D.  TO MOVE.

W/UP ARROW/ SPACE.  TO JUMP

HOLD SPACE OR W OR UP ARROW TO JUMP HIGHER.
